name: Midjourney
summary: Midjourney creates detailed images from text prompts with strong aesthetics and community-driven prompt discovery.

name: DALL·E
tagline: OpenAI’s image generation for creative workflows.
summary: DALL·E turns text prompts into images, with inpainting/outpainting and style guidance in the OpenAI ecosystem.
limitations: Style control less granular than SDXL

name: Adobe Firefly
summary: Firefly powers image generation and editing inside Adobe apps like Photoshop and Illustrator.

name: Stability AI (Stable Diffusion)
summary: Stable Diffusion (SDXL) enables controllable image generation on cloud and local runtimes.

name: Leonardo AI
tagline: Image generation for design and game assets.
summary: Leonardo emphasizes production-friendly assets, styles, and model fine-tuning for consistent results.

name: Runway
tagline: Video generation and editing with Gen-2/Gen-3.
summary: Runway provides video gen, motion brush, and editing workflows for creators and studios.

name: Pika
tagline: Text-to-video and video tools for creators.
summary: Pika (pika.art) offers text-to-video and editing features with a creator-focused UX.

name: Synthesia
tagline: AI video with avatars and voiceover.
summary: Synthesia creates presenter-led videos with stock or custom avatars, scripts, and multilingual voiceover.

name: HeyGen
summary: HeyGen helps teams create talking-head and sales videos with avatars and scripts.

name: Descript
tagline: Edit video & audio like a doc.
summary: Descript combines transcription, multitrack editing, and AI tools for creators.

name: Kapwing
tagline: Online video editor with AI assists.
summary: Kapwing is a browser-based video editor with AI tools for creators and teams.

name: ElevenLabs
summary: ElevenLabs offers realistic TTS and voice cloning for content, games, and apps.

name: Play.ht
summary: Play.ht provides text-to-speech voices and cloning for content, apps, and games.

name: Tabnine
tagline: Code completion with local & cloud options.
summary: Tabnine offers privacy-conscious code suggestions with local models and enterprise controls.

name: Codeium
tagline: Free AI code assistant for individuals.
summary: Codeium provides code completion and chat with generous free tier and enterprise features.

name: Cursor
summary: Cursor is a code editor with deep AI integration for inline edits and multi-file refactors.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
summary: Ghostwriter accelerates code and explains errors within the Replit IDE and cloud environment.

name: ChatGPT
summary: ChatGPT answers questions, drafts, and helps with coding via a chat interface and API (Assistants).

name: Claude
summary: Claude is a conversational AI with long context and safety-focused design.

name: Perplexity
summary: Perplexity combines search and LLMs to answer questions with sources and follow-ups.
